import { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { useFetch } from '../../Utils/useFetch' import './Cart.css' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' export const CartProduct = ( { product } ) =>{ //console.log(product) const { removeFromCart, checkedOrNot } = useContext(ShopContext) let salario = 1000; let percentual = 0.07; let aumento = salario * percentual; let novo_salario = salario + aumento; alert(novo_salario) return(
checkedOrNot(e, product.price)} />

{product.title}

{/* Quantidade: */}

R$:{product.price},00

) }
